segments.text: What do you want for your birthday from your parents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Maybe a pair of new shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you ask them to buy you a PC ? You will soon use it at college .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a dandy idea . Thank you for reminding me .
segments.speaker: S2
